Posts.Content: Hi everyone,thought I'd post a message just to check if anyone out there who has had a mastectomy suffers from pain around the scar or chest area from time to time. I had my mastectomy in Aug 2008/2009 followed by chemo/radio but what I'd like to know is does anyone else have pain? :D 0 likes, 4 replies Report
Posts.Title: Mastectomy pain.
